TopicTitle: Building a Space/ Refuel Station FPS

Articles.Content: So I'm trying to build a Refuel/Space Station in Kerbin orbit, to refuel and get ships out further, but there is one problem when I do anything near the Station i get about 6 fps...So I'm trying to figure out how to get them a bit higher? It's not that big currently, I have more parts to launch to it. But with the current fps i get its quite impossible.

I'm going to close this one and redirect to your other thread here. I think you'll get better answers in the gameplay questions forum.

Cheers,

~Claw
